app_desc: A desktop app to save and restore your work context
cap_collecting_desc: Gathering windows, tabs, files, and history
cap_idle_title: No session waiting to be saved
cap_idle_hint: Press {key} and AI will infer your work context for confirmation
cap_ai_loading: AI is inferring your work context…
cap_note_placeholder: Describe what you were working on…
settings_api_hint_gemini: Create a key at Google AI Studio
settings_api_hint_openai: Create a key at OpenAI API Keys
settings_api_hint_anthropic: Create a key at Anthropic Console
settings_browser_desc: Launch the browser and open captured URLs when restoring
settings_autostart_desc: Minimizes to system tray on startup
settings_shortcut_fail_capture: Capture shortcut (may be in use by another app)
settings_shortcut_fail_open: Open shortcut (may be in use by another app)
settings_shortcut_hint: Use key names recognized by Electron
settings_history_mode_hint: "Since last capture" automatically fetches history from the previous save onward
settings_extension_desc: Install the extension to capture all browser tabs (URL + title).
settings_extension_note: Works without the extension, but tab info will be limited.
settings_extension_step1: 1. Click the button below to open the extension folder
settings_extension_step4: 4. Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder
settings_ext_no_tabs: ⚠️ Server running but extension not connected
settings_ext_no_token: ⚠️ Server running but failed to get token
settings_ext_disconnected: ❌ Extension not connected (please install the extension)
settings_hint_gemini: Get API key: aistudio.google.com/apikey  |  Try another model if the test fails
settings_hint_ollama: Install from ollama.com, then run ollama pull llama3.2 to get a model
settings_ext_desc:
Install the browser extension to capture all tab URLs and page titles in real time.
No special launch flags needed. Works with Chrome, Edge, and Brave.
settings_ext_edge_note: Also works with Edge using the same steps
setup_api_hint: Get a key: Open aistudio.google.com/apikey and click "Create API key"
setup_err_format: Google API keys start with "AIza". Please check your key.
setup_fail: ❌ Connection failed. Please check your key.
approval_note_placeholder: Describe what you were working on…
err_ai_fail: AI inference failed. Please enter a note manually.
err_api_key_invalid: API key is invalid. Update it in Settings → AI Engine. Please enter a note manually.
err_rate_limit: API rate limit reached. Wait or change the model in Settings. Please enter a note manually.
err_model_not_found: Model "{model}" not found. Change the model in Settings → AI Engine.
err_ollama_connect: Cannot connect to Ollama. Check if Ollama is running.
err_network: Cannot connect to AI service. Check your network.
err_ai_summary_empty: Could not infer your work context.
err_rate_limit_short: Rate limited. Please wait and try again
err_connect_short: Cannot connect (check if the service is running)
err_model_dropdown: Model "{model}" not found. Select another model from the dropdown
model_gemini_latest: Gemini Flash Latest — Always up to date
ai_prompt:
You are a work context recording system.
From the following PC state snapshot, infer what the user was working on and respond using ONLY the specified format.

[Browser history from the past hour (title and time elapsed)]
{history}

[Currently open browser tabs]
{tabs}

[Open applications]
{windows}

[Recent files]
{files}

[Clipboard content (first 200 chars)]
{clipboard}

[Output format — output NOTHING except this format]
{label_task}: [One sentence describing what they were doing. Verb + object. Example: Configuring Vercel deployment and verifying operation]
{label_refs}: [Top 3-5 services/tabs open, separated by slashes. Example: GitHub / Vercel / Google Search]
{label_remaining}: [One sentence if there are unfinished tasks. Omit this line if none]

Notes:
- Output in {output_lang}
- Do NOT output anything outside the format: no preamble, no explanation, no "Is this correct?"
- Use specific proper nouns: page titles, video names, service names
- Prioritize browsing history flow (what was researched, how it progressed)
- If multiple activities, put the main one in "{label_task}" and list all in "{label_refs}"
ai_section_history: Browser history from the past hour (title and time elapsed)
update_latest_body: You are running the latest version (v{version}).
settings_auto_update_desc: Notifies you when a new version is available
